transcript: 45-year-old male with gunshot wound to abdomen. Patient is conscious and alert. Entry wound in right lower quadrant. Exit wound in left flank. Patient is hemodynamically stable. Blood pressure 110/70, heart rate 95. Need trauma consult for GSW to abdomen.
activation_page: Trauma consult for 45-year-old male with gunshot wound to abdomen. Patient conscious, stable vitals. Entry and exit wounds present. Trauma team consultation required.
